content.raw: Gazebo 9 already depends on `ign-common1`, but I don't think the system paths logic will be migrated to use `ign-common` for Gazebo 10. Gazebo 11 will use `ign-common` exclusively, so it will also use `SystemPaths` and `URI` from there; so unless you need this in Gazebo 9 or 10, you should be fine without this PR. Feel free to decline it if that's the case.

Gazebo 11 will use ign-common exclusively, so it will also use SystemPaths and URI from there; so unless you need this in Gazebo 9 or 10, you should be fine without this PR.
